ThingDef.label: equine penis
ThingDef.description: A equine penis. Huge for a human.

ThingDef.label: equine vagina
ThingDef.description: A equine vagina. Gaping vagina just begs Studs to plow it.

ThingDef.label: feline penis
ThingDef.description: A feline penis. Long, thin and barbed.

ThingDef.label: feline vagina
ThingDef.description: A feline vagina. Long and thin vagina with clittoris inside, perfect for barbed feline cocks.

ThingDef.label: canine penis
ThingDef.description: A canine penis. Thick and knotted.

ThingDef.label: canine vagina
ThingDef.description: A canine vagina. Has enough strength to keep cock inside for 20 minutes.

ThingDef.label: dragon penis
ThingDef.description: A dragon penis. Thick and HARD.

ThingDef.label: dragon vagina
ThingDef.description: A dragon vagina. It's gaping, probably good for laying eggs.

ThingDef.label: procyonine penis
ThingDef.description: A procyonine penis. Impressive length, but very thin and inflexible.

ThingDef.label: hemipenis
ThingDef.description: A reptilian hemipenis. Two knobbly shafts with flexible barbs.

ThingDef.label: crocodilian penis
ThingDef.description: A crocodilian penis. Very rigid and has a thick bulbous base, but otherwise similar to a humanoid penis.

ThingDef.label: narrow vagina
ThingDef.description: A narrow vagina. A deep, but particularly thin vagina.

ThingDef.label: needle-like penis
ThingDef.description: A needle-like penis. A rather long, but exceptionally thin penis.

ThingDef.label: rodent vagina
ThingDef.description: A rodent vagina. A vagina barely even large enough to fit a human finger.

ThingDef.label: rodent penis
ThingDef.description: A rodent penis. A truly tiny penis, built for the bare minimum of function.

ThingDef.label: cloacal penis
ThingDef.description: A cloacal penis. A male sex organ tucked away inside a slit.

ThingDef.label: cloacal vagina
ThingDef.description: A cloacal vagina. A female, egg-laying sex organ.

ThingDef.label: udder
ThingDef.description: Large udder, possibly from muffalo or some similar animal. May be attached to humanoids for literal cowgirl look.

ThingDef.label: cloacal anus
ThingDef.description: A cloacal anus. An anus hidden within a common port for the reproductive organs, known as a cloaca.
